title: What is the US middle to high school math curriculum? - Quora
tags: Education in the United States of America

response.answer_text: It depends. For an average student, the hardest thing you'll get to is pre-calculus, or algebra. But for advanced students, you'll get to the equivalent of Calc 2 in college, covering series, improper integrals and the like. There's also courses like physics c e&m which expose students to applications of calculus.
A2A. What is the US middle to high school math curriculum? Khan Academy has math tutorials for K-14 curriculum. If you click on the Courses dropdown tab, you will see Math and Math by grade.
